title: Fixed exchange rate-Country Z inflation increases

content.question: Assuming fixed exchange rates, if country Z’s rate of inflation increases relative to its trading partners, Country Z’s imports and exports will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Imports: No change
Exports: No change

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
